page.title: 03HOBBIES,RECREATION IN L'POOL
page.content: MY HOBBIES ARE{COLLECTING {RUBBERS,READING AND RUNNING.}I COLLECT RUBBERS WHICH LOOK LIKE SWEETS,FURNITURE,ETC.I HAVE 130 RUBBERS.I READ {ENID BLYTON }AND OTHER AUTHORS.ALTOGETHER I HAVE 175 BOOKS INCLUDING ANNUALS.I LIKE RUNNING AND HAVE WON A CUP FOR IT.I WOULD LIKE TO MAKE THE SCHOOL CROSS COUNTRY TEAM. THERE IS ONE PLAYING FIELD IN OUR SQUARE (RANWORTH SCHOOL).ANYBODY CAN USE THE FIELD.THREE SCHOOLS USE IT AS A PLAYING FIELD TO PLAY FOOTBALL MATCHES AND ROUNDERS.BESIDE THE FIELD THERE IS A PARK WHICH HAS A PLAYGROUND WITH SWINGS,CLIMBING FRAMES AND A SLIDE.THERE ARE TWO BASKETBALL PITCHES AND A BOWLING GREEN THAT IS NO LONGER USED.
